br.com.caelum.vraptor.serialization.xstream

Class XStreamJSONPSerialization

  • java.lang.Object
    • br.com.caelum.vraptor.serialization.xstream.XStreamJSONPSerialization
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JSONPSerialization, View

    @Component
public class XStreamJSONPSerialization
extends Object
implements JSONPSerialization
    Default implementation for JSONPSerialization that decorates default jsonSerialization output adding the callback padding
    Since:
    3.3.0
    Author:
    Lucas Cavalcanti, Pedro Matiello
